headline: Is PulteGroup’s Valuation Fair After Year-to-Date Gains and News on Community Launches?
summary: Wondering if PulteGroup is a bargain or just riding the wave? This is the perfect place to find out if the price tag matches what the company is really worth. The stock has had a mild lift of 1.6% over the past week and is basically flat for the last 30 days. Looking back further, it is up an impressive 11.8% year-to-date, even after a 6.6% dip over the past year. Much of this volatility can be traced to shifting expectations in the housing market and recent news around mortgage rates and...
